name: Masters of Space
description:
This is my first game created with LibGdx.

It is based on the Space-Shooter-Game Tutorial from Brandon Grasley. 

It is not really finished and probabely never will be.

There is no progress and there are no levels. It just goes on and on until  your ship gets destroyed.

Controls:

Move: W A S D
or click and move mouse.

Credits:

Main Menu theme: Art of Silence - Uniq
Scene Music: High Voltage - JuliusH
